results.title: Power
results.brief_description: Power system in automobiles. Cylinder; piston operation; 4-cycle action of intake, compression, power and exhaust; differences between 1, 4 and 6 cylinder engines; power turning the wheels. Animated diagrams assist the explanations.

results.title: Poverty, child health & child labour
results.creator_credit: Darrel Schwandt, George A. Colburn, DLGHS and GPN
results.brief_description:
Episode number 21 of Series “The Worlds of childhood”.
Explores the socioeconomic factors that have historically played a powerful role in children’s lives, and contrasts the decline in infant/child mortality and child labour in industrialised societies. Child labour in Guatemala provides one of several examples of the harsh economic circumstances in which many children still live.

results.title: Pottery without a wheel. Parts. 1-3
results.creator_credit: Richard Philps and Educational Foundation for Visual Aids
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “The Potter: a series of films”.
The use of clay for the formation of useful objects such as tiles, trays and pots is discussed and demonstrated in this video which is specifically aimed at junior grades. Most of the examples are made with the assistance of students. These are treated in sequential order and degree of difficulty: Pottery without a wheel Part 1 - the use of coil pots are shown and made, the movement and rolling of clay as with the tools which are used for shaping and finishing are discussed. Pottery without a wheel Part 2 - the techniques of firing and finishing of the pots are shown. The making of tiles and other rolled objects are shown. Pottery without a wheel Part 3 - This discusses the firing and glazing of the finished pots and clay objects.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Richard Philps and Educational Foundation for Visual Aids

results.title: Pottery without a wheel
results.brief_description: The best clay for pottery making is secured in Cornwall. Film shows how clay is prepared and how a thumb pot is made. Also demonstrates how to make a pot or model by the coil method, and how to make tiles and the various methods of decorating then with slip.
